sentence:
• Boeing Co. (NYSE: BA ) received a record commitment from Indonesian budget carrier Lion Air, winning a provisional order for 230 planes
• H. J. Heinz Company (NYSE: HNZ ) posted better-than-expected second quarter 2012 adjusted earnings of $0.81 per share, inching ahead of the Zacks Consensus Estimate by a penny
• Dollar Tree, Inc.'s (NASDAQ: DLTR ) third-quarter fiscal 2011 earnings came in at $0.87 a share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.83 cents per share
• According to a report in The Wall Street Journal, the chief executive of wireless broadband network operator Clearwire Corporation (NASDAQ: CLWR ) said the company might skip its a $237 million interest payment due on December 1, 2011.

Following the announcement, shares of the company plunged 21%
• Google Inc. (NASDAQ: GOOG ) announced the availability of Google Music store as an app on Google TV
• Salesforce.com (NYSE: CRM ) posted third quarter fiscal 2012 adjusted net income of $0.08 per share, well ahead of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.03 per share.

However, results missed analysts' estimates on billings for the first time in 10 quarters
• Margaret Hamburg, M.D., FDA Commissioner, said that she had revoked FDA approval on Roche Holding AG's (OTC:RHHBY.PK) Avastin, after clinical trials concluded the drug was not safe and effective for breast cancer
• Kirkland's Inc. (NASDAQ: KIRK ) posted third-quarter 2011 earnings of $0.06 per share, moving ahead of the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.04 per share

The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
